Body:
dir_path = os.path.join(WD, 'data_files', '3_0', 'McMurdo')
status, outfiles = ipmag.aniso_magic(infile='specimens.txt', dir_path=
    dir_path, iboot=1, ihext=0, ivec=1, ipar=1, vec=2, Dir=[0, 90],
    save_plots=True, isite=True)
self.assertTrue(status)
for fname in outfiles:
    self.assertTrue(os.path.exists(fname))
files = glob.glob('*.png')
self.assertEqual(24, len(files))
